text: Bar guizbangɨra, gumazitam ia gativaghtɨ, ia mati kalabuziar gumazamizibar mɨn ikiam, o a ian biziba bar ada gɨvagham, o a ia gifar ia isɨ uan gavgavimɨn apengan darɨgham, o a uabɨ uabɨ damigh gumazir ekiamɨn mɨn ikiam, o a ian tav akar kurabar a damuva, an guam apezegham. Eghtɨ gumazir arazir kabar ia gamiba, ia uari men amamangatɨghtɨ, me uari ifongezɨ moghɨn ia damuam.
